changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(1,'THIS MONTH','0 MONTH')

INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(4,'PREVIOUS MONTH','1 MONTH')
INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(5,'THIS YEAR','0 YEAR')

INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(7,'LAST YEAR','1 YEAR')
INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(8,'PREVIOUS YEAR','1 YEAR')
INSERT INTO tbl_word_replace (gkey,act_string,replace_string) VALUES(11,'TEAM LEADS','TEAM LEAD')
